game.title: The Lost Treasure of El Dorado
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of El Dorado.
game.description: In the heart of the Amazon jungle lies the lost city of El Dorado. Legend has it that this city holds a treasure of immense value. You've been hired by a wealthy explorer to find this treasure and bring it back to him.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the lost city.
task.description: The entrance is said to be hidden in a secret cave. You'll need to search for clues and navigate through the jungle to locate it.

task.objective: Defeat the guardians of the treasure.
task.description: The guardians are rumored to be fierce warriors. Approach them with caution and use your wit to outsmart them.
task.location: The lost city of El Dorado's entrance

task.description: Once you've defeated the guardians, follow the ancient symbols leading to the hidden chamber where the treasure awaits.
task.location: The lost city of El Dorado's treasure chamber
